job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Oda processes thousands of real estate images every day to better understand and serve to different audiences with evolving interests and tastes. As a machine learning engineer in our team, you'll help build and scale our cutting-edge Oda Optimization image processing and recommendation pipeline.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>What you'll do:</p><ul><li>Develop &amp; Train &amp; Monitor deep learning models to improve various Oda products.</li><li>Collect &amp; Clean &amp; Generate custom datasets for DL/ML model training.&nbsp;</li><li>Design and implement software solutions to improve our image processing pipeline to personalize services to different clients.&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p>What we're looking for:</p><ul><li>2+ years of industry experience</li><li>BS or MS in Computer Science, Statistics or related field</li><li>Experience working with CNN, Autoencoder and Transformer architectures&nbsp;</li><li>Expertise in Pytorch / Tensorflow or other GPU APIs</li><li>Hands-on experience with data processing pipelines, databases and large scale machine learning systems</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Nice to have:</p><ul><li>Background in recommendation or computational advertising</li><li>Working knowledge of Reinforcement Learning Algorithms.</li></ul><p><br></p>
